metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28667 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Out-of-bounds write for some Intel(R) PROSet/Wireless WiFi software before version 22.140 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via adjacent access.

notes.Note: alexmurray> It is not clear from the upstream advisory which software component is affected and hence what patches if any may be available to fix it, but since the advisory states that Linux is affected I am presuming this may be the iwlwifi driver within the kernel and hence am assigning it to the kernel packages in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: linux package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
